title: What is the position of each member of TXT? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't know much about them but tried to find some information about them...hope you get the answer of your question… Checkout our TXT member guide below: Group Name: TOMORROW X TOGETHER (pronounced “Tomorrow by Together”)Shortened Group Name: TXTKorean Hangul Name: 투모로우바이투게더Group Members: Soobin, Yeonjun, Beomgyu, Taehyun, Huening Kai.Debut date: March 4, 2019Debut album: The Dream chapter : Star. Are you getting excited for Big Hit to debut their new group TOMORROW X TOGETHER? Here’s a profile on each of the TXT members! Big Hit Entertainment’s new boy group TXT is still brand new and they’ve already built up a lot of interest already!  Stage Name: SoobinFull Name: Choi SubinKorean Hangul Name: 수빈Position: Leader, Rapper, VocalistBirthday: December 5, 2000Age: 18Height: 185 cm (6.06 ft)Nickname: SlothHobbies: Reading, listening to music, spacing out Bio: Soobin was the second member of TXT to be introduced, and is also the second oldest TXT member. Big Hit also confirmed that Soobin is the leader of TOMORROW X TOGETHER which means there will be a lot of responsibility placed on his shoulders. He’s also described as having a lot of charm. Soobin has also revealed that he has an older sister and an older brother. His family also owns a long-haired chihuahua named Sean. Soobin described himself as one who enjoys to eat a lot and hates dieting. Interestingly, he also named BTS member Jin as someone he loves so perhaps they share their love of food with each other. The other members describe him as being deeply caring and kind which makes him the perfect leader. He’s also a homebody who loves snowy days. Soobin also has a habit of winking randomly which the other members find funny. TXT’s leader seems to pay special attention to fans comments and says that reading what fans have left for them makes him smile. Soobin is also described as a warm member that everyone can easily approach and the other members find comfort in being around him. He’s also said that his personality is very shy and a little reserved! Some of his posts on social media, like on their official fan website point towards him still adjusting to being in the limelight. His 2nd debut diary explained that, “everything right now still feels awkward and to avoid making any mistakes I have to be careful.” TXT member Yeonjun  Stage Name: YeonjunFull Name: Choi Yeon JoonKorean Hangul Name: 연준Position: Dancer, Rapper, VocalistBirthday: September 13, 1999Age: 19Height: 181.5 cm (5.95 ft)Hobbies: Dancing, riding s-board, eating food Bio: Yeonjun was the very first member of TXT to be announced by Big Hit, and is also the oldest member of the group. He’s described as having “outstanding dancing skills” and had also auditioned for Cube Entertainment prior to joining Big Hit. He’s the only member of TXT that is an only child. Prior to debuting, Yeonjun starred in a Ramyeon commercial and also acted as a backup dancer for BTS. Yeonjun has been fun to watch on social media so far, and is already getting a reputation for writing in jokes/puns. He often writes about the cold weather, his excitement for debut, and how hard they’ve been practicing! The dancer has also revealed that he love hip hop music and was always number one in dance, singing, and rapping in their monthly evaluations during their trainee days. He’s also joked that the members once thought he was really cool but now they only think he’s cute. Beomgyu teased in a diary that Yeonjun has been studying up on puns, and how cute it is. The other members have also said that he’s sentimental and even cried once while reading a poem. In his last pre-debut diary, Yeonjun revealed that he’s been training for 5 years to debut! Whether he spent all of this time with Big Hit or if he’s counting his years training as a dancer prior to joining the company is still unknown. TXT member Beomgyu:  Stage Name: BeomgyuFull Name: Choi BeomgyuKorean Hangul Name: 범규Position: VocalistBirthday: March 13, 2001Age: 17Height: 179 cm (5.87 ft)Nickname: Bamgyu, CookieHobbies: Playing guitar Bio: Beomgyu was the fifth member of TXT to be revealed. At the age of 17 he’s right in the middle of the group between the two older members (Yeonjun and Soobin) and the two younger members (Huening Kai and Taehyun). He’s said to bring a “bright and energetic appearance” to the group. He has two older brothers and is the owner of a parrot name “TOTO.” Beomgyu is from Daegu, much like his record-mates BTS members Kim Taehyung (V) and Min Yoongi (Suga). He can also play the guitar and used that talent to get through his audition for Big Hit. Beomgyu has stated that he can easily make friends because he enjoys feeling love and affection. He’s also one who likes to joke around and be mischievous, especially when the other members are recording videos. The others said that he can be very talkative but also has a bright personality and sends positive vibes to everyone. Beomgyu has a fondness for posting silent videos on the groups twitter account, and has this little habit of shaking his hands violently so that his whole phone moves while he’s recording which makes it super endearing. One of his videos also revealed that he and Taehyun are attending the same school together. Interestingly, Beomgyu was also the only member to write his name in English on their first posts which revealed drawings they’d each done. This could indicate that he’s already been studying English and could be fluent. He’s said that he enjoys playing basketball in his free time. He also revealed his regrets about not being able to show more of their skills in a diary post on their website saying, “I am very sorry that there is nothing that I can show other than [my] face to fans right now but I want to show a wonderful and powerful stage as a gift of reward for the fans who expect us and wait for us by practicing hard until the day of debut!” TXT member Taehyun:  Stage Name: TaehyunFull Name: Kang TaehyunKorean Hangul Name: 태현Position: VocalistBirthday: February 5, 2002Age: 17Height: 177 cm (5.8 ft)Nickname: Loveable/adorableHobbies: Football, swimming Bio: Taehyun was the fourth member of TXT to be revealed. He’s said to offer a “cool, free-spirited charm” to the group. He has one older brother and one older sister. From what we’ve seen so far, Taehyun appears to have a calmer energy than some of the other boys in the group. Much like the groups leader Soobin, he’s more laid back. Taehyun was described as the brain of the group by his members. As well as being very mature, logical, and full of passion. He’s also said that he was once a picky eater but eats really well these days, except for spicy food. Though the way the other members eat sometimes makes him feel like he eats less than they do. Taehyun and Beomgyu also attend the same school and will go there together. He has also said that he enjoys playing football (soccer) with his friends, though he hasn’t had as much time to do so lately. His debut diary revealed that he was feeling the pressure of getting ready for debut, but said that it was fun with the other members. Despite the nervousness, he sounded passionate about performing saying “I am so grateful to those who support me, and I want to reward them with a wonderful stage, so I have a more complete obsession with the stage.” TXT member Huening Kai:  Stage Name: Huening KaiFull Name: Kai Kamal HueningKorean Hangul Name: 휴닝카이Position: Maknae, VocalistBirthday: August 14, 2002Age: 16Height: 181.5 cm (5.95 ft)Nickname: Hyuka, NingNingHobbies: Playing instruments Bio: Huening Kai was the third member of TXT to be revealed by Big Hit and is also the groups maknae (youngest member)! It appears that he comes from a very musical family and has two sisters. As the baby of the group it doesn’t come as surprise that he’s said to bring a “refreshing and innocent appeal” to the group. As a Korean-American, he’s also Big Hit’s first international artist ever! Huening Kai’s is already making a good impression as the group’s maknae and acting like an adorable little child on their social media. He might also be the meme king of the group, with fans using his videos to have fun. His debut diary also teased how hard they’ve been working saying, “We keep choreographing together with the members.” Huening Kai has also revealed that he’s able to play several instruments and learns them easily, including piano, guitar, and drums. His weakness is a lack of flexibility and says that he has wooden legs. Among the members he’s especially close with the group’s leader Soobin. He also loves jelly snacks, skinship, and drawing Hangul. Editors note:I’ll update this article as more information is confirmed about the group.

I don’t know if everybody would agree with this, but honestly, I’m going to put my thoughts out there. If there were set positions in TXT’’s group, I think they would be: Yeonjun: Main Rapper, Main Dancer, Sub Vocalist  Soobin: Leader, Lead Vocalist, Sub Rapper  Beomgyu: Main Dancer, Visual, Center, Vocalist, Lead Rapper  Taehyun: Main Vocalist, Sub Rapper, Dancer  Huening Kai: Lead Vocalist, Visual, Dancer, Sub Rapper, Face of the Group   (Who loves their minisode1: Blue Hour photos?) Now, why I picked all of this. For Yeonjun, I picked main rapper and main dancer (obviously) because he wasn’t a legendary trainee for nothing. Sub vocalist because his vocals are pretty good, stable. For Soobin, I picked lead vocalist because he gets a lot of parts, and he has that falsetto (man, why you gotta kill MOAs every comeback?) that kills MOAs inside, in a good way. And he can rap too, and he’s already leader, so… For Beomgyu, I picked main dancer because I think he’s a great dancer, and he definitely deserves main dancer. He’s visual already, and center because he’s always in the center of their dances and stuff, and lead rapper, because bruh, he can rap! For Taehyun, I picked main vocalist because he has the most stable vocals of the group and can hit pretty high notes. He occasionally raps and he’s pretty good at it, and dancer because he’s also an amazing dancer. For Huening Kai, I picked lead vocalist again because his vocals are very stable, and he would probably be the next main vocalist. He’s definitely a visual and face of the group, and his dance and rap aren’t bad, really. And if you think I don’t know them, I saw them on the exact day they debuted on March 4th, 2019 on the Mnet’s ‘Debut Celebration Show’ ’cause I was there, so in your face! *not trying to be rude, just gotten mean messages from people saying I don’t know them.* I don’t know if you all agree with this, but it’s my opinion, not yours. You can comment what you all think though! Also, hope this helped!
